website_summaries.verdict: Creates a healthy, sun kissed glow that looks natural and subtle.
pros: Designed to be used all over the face to provide even coverage and an allover sun-kissed look
This product doesn't use any synthetic dyes or materials
A great choice for acne-prone skin
Choose between 5 different shade in either natural or radiant finish
cons: Best for allover color as opposed to specific spot treatment

customer_reviews.title: NOT full size,  only a sample.
customer_reviews.text: Although this product is advertised as .03 oz. This item is NOT a full size blush; which is .03 oz. I have been using this particular blush for several years and the regular size is .03 oz. and a larger container. This item is a sample size and does not state the oz. on the package. I'm returning.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Scam- falsly advertised- buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The product being sold is falsly advertised. I have my old container I purchased from Ulta stating it is .03 ounces and double the size of the sample size I received. It doesn't even come with the little info paper under the lid. Probably not an authentic product either. Sending this back- scam to advertise for a false product. I'll be sticking to Ulta for my bare minerals.
customer_reviews.author: JJ7

customer_reviews.title: Total Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Fraud alert! The description of the item was .03oz. I have an old one that states clearly that it is .03oz. These are super tiny. Not even close to the size in the listing. Sadly I bought 7, so I was seriously ripped off. These are so tiny that I have no idea how to even get a brush into the container that is a big enough brush for blush. If I wanted to use this as an eyeliner, I could get a fine detail brush in to get some product, but this is completely useless as a blush. This seller is stealing from the customer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lehman

customer_reviews.title: NOT the size advertised
customer_reviews.text: NOT the size advertised - I purchased a .03 ounce blush, based on the size I was using. What arrived was clearly not that size, when though packaging indicated it was.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Crew

customer_reviews.title: Great color for fair skin!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this blush! I have a fair complexion and I don’t like blushes that make me look like I’m a clown from the circus. This color is perfect for me and is long lasting! It has the quality that you would hope for from Bare Minerals and I love that it’s not too dark for fair skin like mine. So far I’ve been using it for 2 months, and I would imagine that it will last me for about 4 months total.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is Just a Hint of Color!
customer_reviews.text: Bare Minerals is always my go to line of cosmetics. When I realized I could order this product through Amazon I thought I would give it a try along with other things I was ordering. That being said, I am very familiar with Bare Minerals products so I felt I could compare products accurately. I am pleased to say the seller represented the product well & delivered on time too. The blush is the same quality, same packaging, same size as what I get directly from the Bare Minerals site.
customer_reviews.author: Kaybee

customer_reviews.title: My favorite blush ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing bare minerals for at least 10+ years. This product is like no other. Many companies have tried to duplicate their formula but have failed in my opinion. Once again I let my fingers do the shopping so easy and stress free! Awesome product 😁
customer_reviews.author: karmaconscious7

customer_reviews.title: almost out of date product
customer_reviews.text: Received product with a sticker on the bottom that states product expires 01/31/2020. Seller emails me and said powders do not normally have an expiration date and they would not necessarily be aware of it. Seller is sure it will work just as well for quite some time and most powders will say they are good for 6 to 12 months from when you open they and knows that most people will use them for way longer without any issues. I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: karen mitchell

customer_reviews.title: This is authentic
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Bare Minerals for close to a decade. I used to wear the golden gate blush color but found that the color "true" was better for my complexion. Unfortunately, that color has been discontinued so I ordered the "dusk". When I received in the mail at first it looked too dark and ruddy like a sunset however when I applied this morning before I sent it back I found it wasn't too dark; actually like the color better than my "true". I am olive light skinned (similar to an ivory/beige) and have dark blonde/light brown hair and it is perfect with my golden/olive complexion and brown eyes. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Size is smaller than what is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This item is listed as being .03 oz. It was more like a sample size and no where near .03 oz. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Uranga

customer_reviews.title: Favorite color
customer_reviews.text: I was very sad to hear that Bareminerals no longer makes this "Laughter" colored blush. It is the only color I've found that truly works with my complexion! Sad to have to try and find a new color, I went to Amazon to see if perhaps there were a few containers left! I was a little concerned I would be getting a cheap knock off but the blush checks out! The container had all the markings that another reviewer had pointed out were missing from their "fake". I am definitely considering stocking up on this favorite color!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Wakimoto

customer_reviews.title: Fraud listing
customer_reviews.text: Fraud listing. Product is not 0.03 oz as advertised. The total container should be 2x2x1 inch weighting 0.08 oz. The actual product is half the size weighing 0.04 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Jobin

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, and love this color! Pros: - Long-lasting, stays throughout the day without losing intensity - Great for sensitive skin - Comes off easily with eye makeup remover Overall, I would recommend this product! Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: oneboyonegirl

customer_reviews.title: Not Bare Minerals
customer_reviews.text: Beware this is not Bare Minerals and it is not .03 ounces!!! Fraud!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_Lewis MA

customer_reviews.title: Love Bare Minerals
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Bare Minerals for years. Beauty is one of my favorites and goes with my skin tone. I'm a Winter. Bare Minerals feels good on your skin and doesn't feel or look like you have a lot of makeup on.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly1511

customer_reviews.title: Great company to order from!
customer_reviews.text: You cannot go wrong with Bare Min. This company stands behind their products and is great to work with this. Lovely is one of my favorite shades. Goes great with my strawberry blond hair skin....that is able to tan. I have fairly dark skin for a natural redhead....must be the brown eyes? Anyway.....I think this color will compliment almost all skin shades. Thank you again seller :0
customer_reviews.author: Kayrun1

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color blush!
customer_reviews.text: This is great blush! A nice, natural pink good for fair skin. If you want it darker, just apply a bit more. I have very sensitive skin and the Bare Minerals products never irritate my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1972

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with BM loose blushes
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with BM loose blushes. I use them as eye shadows too. They are build-able, natural, and hued for flattery for all skin tones. I'm warm, light/med, combo skin and the colors Golden Gate and Beauty are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: seymour5000

customer_reviews.title: Great blush!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over 5 years. It comes in a variety of colors, the one I've always used is "Hint." Each jar lasts me close to one year. It stays on throughout the day without my having to reapply it.
customer_reviews.author: GoT forever!

customer_reviews.title: Blush is a “10”, container frustrating to me.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blush, I have been using for several years. My only complaint is with the change made by bare minerals to the container(couple of years ago), that doesn’t allow me get that last bit of product out.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I love and recommend this blush!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this color of blush for years! I'm a Bare Minerals girl. The blush lasts all day, no need for touch ups. I'm very happy that I can purchase it from Amazon. I received the order on time.
customer_reviews.author: Carol F

customer_reviews.title: Not standing up to the name
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay on like the Bare Minerals I buy from Ulta. My opinion... this isn’t Bare Mineral. But that’s just me. I have other colors and they are awesome and last. This one doesn’t
customer_reviews.author: L J

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this is the amount of powder that is advertised (2 grams). The Plastic tab that needs to be peeled back was VERY hard to rip off. The color is off and the powder is gritty and does not distribute evenly. I went to Ulta and got the real and it is different than what I got at Amazon. The product on the left is the one I got from Ulta. The Amazon product is half full and in the pictures you can appreciate the difference in the color.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To blush and manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! Tap a small amount into the lid and pick up with your brush from the lid. Lasts all day! And I am not hyper sensitive to this product. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Nice shade and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I already had this color from a gift set, and it's a good coral-rose shade - doesn't compete with clothing colors and looks natural. A little goes a long way and it stays on well. I don't touch up during the day - maybe once if I am going somewhere in the evening. I like the fact that the mineral blushes don't tend to settle into fine lines the way a talc-based product will.
customer_reviews.author: JCH

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: It was incredible small. Not big enough to even scoop with brush. Have to dump some out to get your brush covered. Overall the products are one of my fav blushes
customer_reviews.author: BritKrjs

customer_reviews.title: NOT full size as advertised
customer_reviews.text: As noted by other reviewers, this is a sample-size product, not full size as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Nedine Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: NOT size listed
customer_reviews.text: The add is the prime order for a 0.03 oz or 0.85 g size blush. You get a sample size that is NOT the amount that is listed.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM JENKINS

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Been using this color and brand for a number of yrs now, was very pleased to find it online, TY
customer_reviews.author: Jazzer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent color for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used this bare mineral product for years and was so happy to be able to find it again. I thank them for still carrying this color (Golden Gate) after all these years. I hate it when colors are discontinued...........
customer_reviews.author: Linda N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color and light weight. Looks great and will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Great powder blush.  bareMinerals is my favorite makeup of all time.
customer_reviews.text: I am sad that this color is discontinued. I had used it for about 16 years so maybe it's time for a change in color for me!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: A Little Bit Goes A lon Way!
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but a little too pink for me regardless of how much I tap off the brush. So I end up covering it up a little bit more with the lite concealer from another mineral makeup kit.
customer_reviews.author: Dory Raymond

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only bought Bare Minerals from Ulta so I was hesitant to buy it anywhere else but this is the real thing. The color was exactly what I’ve always used.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: 💝 bare minerals!
customer_reviews.text: I still love this makeup line! My order was complete and on time....happiness!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: It stays on all day.
customer_reviews.text: I like this blush. The color is perfect and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Genese B Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in record time and appears to be as advertised. The color is exactly the same as original. The sealed container and information on it is exactly the same as the store bought. I feel confident this is authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Lofir

customer_reviews.title: Like it should be, just a Hint of blush is all you need to feel great!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. It is great. So is the color, "Hint". It truly is a hint. However, the top of one of the blushes was cracked. I am using it anyway, because I was out!!!
customer_reviews.author: ESD

customer_reviews.title: I thought the color would be too dark but it actually is not and I apply it lightly
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product long lasting and I love this brand and the color is vibrant and very nice
customer_reviews.author: torwal83

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fresh color
customer_reviews.text: Love the fresh summer pink tone of this blush. A tiny bit goes a long way too..... jar lasts about a year for me & I use this everyday👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the Best !!
customer_reviews.text: Great Blush ! Came fast 💨 great price ! Amazon is the BEST !!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Monroe55

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mineral makeup.
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to color. I love the Bare Minerals products and the ease of buying them through Amazon. I have lighter peach color skin and Giddy Pink gives me just enough color that I don't look overdone.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Steinhilber

customer_reviews.title: I love Bare Minerals Blush.
customer_reviews.text: Bare Minerals products are wonderful. This is one of my favorite blush colors, even though it is now difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color but I will be choosing another color in the future this one is a little dark
customer_reviews.author: melody lynn cooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice finishing touch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love Bareminerals Escape blush. Perfect light mauve/pink color that I like. Brightens up my fair to medium complexion all year round and a nice finishing touch to makeup. Only problem is that I can no longer purchase it in retail stores & only online.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and the color looks nice and natural on my skin
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: beautiful pink - very fresh lookin
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pink color. Goes on evenly with the Bare Essentials Application Face Brush. The two work perfectly together. The brush seems to hold just the right amount of product.
customer_reviews.author: DottieDear

customer_reviews.title: Bare Mineral “Hint” blush
customer_reviews.text: This is much more affordable & convenient than buying at Ulta especially since it was closed to public! Great color with a “Hint” of shimmer!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: BareMinerals blush will last a very long time and always looks great. I have worn the Pearl for a few years and decided to experiment a little for the summer. I am not completely in love with this color, but it is a nice change and very natural looking. It does brighten me up! I have olive skin and really think this would be especially beautiful on someone with a less olive skintone.
customer_reviews.author: Annette T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pink
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and feel of this blush. It stays on all day. It is a wonderful pink hue.
customer_reviews.author: Andria M Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, and a good color. Natural look, lasts a long time, even on oily skin. Will continue to purchase Bare Mineral products--just wish they would bring back the "heaven" blush--it was the perfect color for my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schrecker

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance free
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup, have been using it for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Marie Bonanno DeFrank

customer_reviews.title: Goes on natural and stays on !
customer_reviews.text: Bare minerals is my fav, with the shut down from Covid I was so happy to find it on line
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl villarreal

customer_reviews.title: My go-to blush
customer_reviews.text: I have fair skin so a little dab of the Hint blush is all I need. I begin very lightly as an all-over tint and then layer on a little more on my cheeks if I need to. It’s a good airbrushed look.
customer_reviews.author: P Gross

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I love the product however, I ordered 2 of them in the color “Beauty” but the color “Hint” is what I got. It is such a hassle to return I will keep these I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: Great color and good for your skin tone. I wish it were a bit longer lasting it tends to wear off midday.
customer_reviews.author: dp

customer_reviews.title: Great Color for anyone.
customer_reviews.text: This color can be used for any skin tone, between a pink and rose , very pretty, Of course if you don't like loose powder blush, its not for you, but knowing it is natural and won't have a negative effect on skin is enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia K

customer_reviews.title: Happy to find BE Blush in Thistle
customer_reviews.text: Great color - have been using BE for a decade and happy to find Thistle here as it is a great color.
customer_reviews.author: desertsand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the subtle color over my moisturizer for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Love my trainer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Bare Mineral makeup. I have been wearing it since 2006.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Like the Color!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easily and the color is complimentary to my skin tone. Subtle, but effective.
customer_reviews.author: M. Edmondson

customer_reviews.title: Really really small container
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't read the fine print, but this blush is at least 1/2 the size of the ones I normally buy! Cost was adjusted, but jeez....wont buy it again I can tell you.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cianfrani

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT BEAUTY!
customer_reviews.text: A tiny bit goes a very long way. It's beautiful and good for your skin. Always follow up with mineral veil!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love bare minerals
customer_reviews.text: I love bare minerals. Easy to use, makes skin look great with no effort. This is a little pinker than I expected but is just fine for me for the summer
customer_reviews.author: SunSus

customer_reviews.title: Been using Bare Minerals for 15 years and this is ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using Bare Minerals for 15 years and this is the prettiest blush. I never can find it at the stores.
customer_reviews.author: linda goethe

customer_reviews.title: I love the color of this blush
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this blush. I'm Mexican and my skin tone is dark to medi brown. This color compliments my skin tone well.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F. Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Nice blush, but a little light
customer_reviews.text: You can always count on Bare Escentuals to make a quality product, and this is no exception. My only complaint is that it goes on MUCH lighter than you'd expect for this color. I have to use 2 applications for it to even show up on my skin (Caucasian, medium complexion).
customer_reviews.author: Chicken Rancher

customer_reviews.title: Like Bare Minerals blush.
customer_reviews.text: Little bit goes a long way! If you use too much of this color, you'll be wiping it off because it's really quite pink. Should last me forever.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey M.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just use a clean finger to apply. Just a little goes a long way. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: lifegetsbetter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Highly Recommend. Great. Will purchase again and again when needed. Great Price and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: 777-777 Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Price, product availability and the way it works for me
customer_reviews.text: Perfection in a small simple container. Love the natural look
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Love Bare minerals, all day coverage. I'm 75 been using this makeup for years. Beautiful shades.
customer_reviews.author: Joan St Amand

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This was a container of my favorite makeup. It arrived promptly and was exactly what I thought I was getting. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Davie

customer_reviews.title: Love all Bare Minerals products
customer_reviews.text: I love all the Bare Minerals products, and wouldn't ever think of not wearing them. Good for Seniors because it is not heavy and looks natural.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Arrived unopened and early! Will last for a while since I use it on apples of cheeks to give a little color...love this brand!
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: Bare Minerals Blush
customer_reviews.text: This blush is a beautiful shade of pink. It's so intense you only need a touch for a natural look. I love Bare Minerals because it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Zander

customer_reviews.title: Not lasting on your face
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay on your face very long half way through my working day they partially come off
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ann le

customer_reviews.title: Love it -Rosie cheeked grandma
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color for me. Color: Hint. Not so pink as the one foisted on me at the Ulta store.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B. Wojcik

customer_reviews.title: Compassion
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shade for my yellow undertone, pale south asian skin. I had tried 'beauty' before and found that was a nice shade for the cutesie look. Now that I'm older and need a sophisticated look for working in clinics, this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SHASH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great price and sure beats going to the Mall to try to find
customer_reviews.author: Mike Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: All bareMinerals products are really good. Giddy Pink is bright, but can be muted down with foundation or powder, for softer days. I highly recommend bareMinerals.
customer_reviews.author: Kay B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This blush seems very bright when you open it, but it's perfect for my skin tone. It lasts, as a little goes a long way. Quality product
customer_reviews.author: JMom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Such a great color. I have been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: Love this product line and the convenience of Amazon prime.
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo Esnaola

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have medium fair skin and I use it as an all over color... it makes my skin glow! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product.; goes smoothly and stays all day. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador clan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my skin type which is very sensitive. A wonderful coverup and lasts a decent length of time until refill needed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great color no issues with my skin no breakouts it works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Trace Face

customer_reviews.title: Good Blush
customer_reviews.text: I really like that you can tap out exactly how much powder you are going to use and then lock it back up. I hate it when lush spills everywhere. I have been using this blush for a few weeks and I find that it stays on my face all day. The container is also very sturdy. I will buy this blush again.
customer_reviews.author: Sabollman

customer_reviews.title: ... in my book I use this instead of blush love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bare minerals can do no wrong in my book I use this instead of blush love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sajauna McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: This color works great for those with golden fair complexions. It looks dark in the bottle, but on it's a a soft pink glow like a soft real blush.
customer_reviews.author: Anony Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Thistle!!! I found my favorite color BE blush!
customer_reviews.text: Thistle is the BEST color, BE the best blush....I have tried and tried others, I always come back to thistle. This color is not available on the usual sight that I buy it from, I sure hope they don't discontinue. If in doubt of what color to get, get thistle. I have a medium complextion and tan in the summer, this color is the best ever!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very fine powder, nice color, and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: It's my absolute favorite blush!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find this shade anywhere in the stores. It's my absolute favorite blush!
customer_reviews.author: lilg05

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this it's my 3rd jar. It's an excellent product. I never plan to be without
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Love it--again and again.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite color blush from my favorite make up brand. Win!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S Royer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent packaging and fast shipping! Thank you!! (Love the product too!)
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: great color
customer_reviews.text: So pleased to find this discontinued color. Quality product at a good price. just a little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: D. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have found it
customer_reviews.text: Not sold in stores anymore. Glad to have found it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too dark
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the color at all. Too dark for me. I wanted Indulgence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Bare Minerals Blush Highlighters, Beauty, 0.03 Ounce (1 Count)
product_meta.description: Color:Beauty| Size:0.03 Ounce (1 Count)This blush is ultra fine and easy to blend powder blush for fresh-looking skin. It brighten up your complexion and give yourself fresh, radiant-looking skin.
feature_bullets: For all skin types including sensitive and problem-prone skin
Add a soft, radiant glow to your complexion
The package dimension of the product is 9"L x 6"W x 3"H

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
